alert.note: Alert for Atlantic; Camden; Cumberland; Gloucester; Salem (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 5:58PM EDT until July 29 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN ATLANTIC...NORTHEASTERN CUMBERLAND...EAST CENTRAL SALEM...SOUTHEASTERN CAMDEN AND SOUTHERN GLOUCESTER COUNTIES... At 558 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Franklinville, or 11 miles north of Vineland, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Vineland, Glassboro, Hammonton, Pitman, Clayton, Buena, Woodstown, Alloway, Chesilhurst, Newfield, Elmer, Franklinville, Sicklerville, Victory Lakes, Williamstown, Olivet, Malaga, Mullica Hill, Mizpah and Monroe Township. This includes Atlantic City Expressway between mile markers 26 and 41. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
